response.original_title: Un Seul Visage (Some came here to hide)
response.overview: “An image as a colour and a colour as a landscape, as they exist. At night, I wander through the streets, in search of resemblances, in the faces and the bodies of others. For whom do I close my eyes at night? A phantom image, a single face that is not there. I show a world that is not mine, that is not real. The image carries my words, words that are eroded. What can I tell, close to the places that I do not show you?” (MC)
response.title: Un Seul Visage (Some came here to hide)
